name: New Legal Aid
overview: New Legal Aid specializes in DUI, criminal and immigration. Our team consists of legal experts with a combined 35 years of hands-on experience. Our purpose is to make the legal process simple and affordable for everyone, and that’s EXACTLY what we do. If you need legal assistance, look no further… We offer everything from hands-on council to convenient online document filing. Many of our services save clients upwards of 85%. If you’re facing serious criminal charges, and demand a competent team of experts to handle the case, give us a call for a free consultation. And if the charges or court requirements are less demanding, simply chose our online document filing services and be finished within 15 minutes. To get started, simply fill out the appropriate questionnaire, or give us a call @ (909) 890-2350. From this very moment, you can be finished in 15 minutes or less. Now that’s Incredible isn’t it… New Legal Aid is a prime example of online convenience, a big thanks to our technological society. Take advantage of this incredible opportunity and save hundreds (even thousands) of dollars by hiring New Legal Aid today! Where Every Moment Counts…
